jsonSchema.title: Database Credentials Schema
jsonSchema.description: This schema defines the structure of database credentials, storing sensitive information securely.

name.description: A unique name for the database connection.

username.description: The username used for database access.

password.description: The password for database access, stored securely in the vault.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the database server.

port.description: The port number on which the database server is listening.
